title: How Ludiks uses Ludiks
subtitle: An educational showcase, powered by our own platform.
intro1: At Ludiks, we don't just build a gamification tool. We use it actively, at the very heart of our product, to show you what you can do with it.
intro2: On this page, you explore our own gamified profile, designed to demonstrate different types of journeys: some are purely analytical, meant to observe adoption, friction points or conversion rates. Others aim for activation, engagement or retention, with simple but effective mechanics: unlocking features, contextual 'wow' effects, step-by-step progression, mini rewards...
intro3: Every element you see here is a real use case, implemented with Ludiks' public SDK, and fully reproducible on your own platform—whether you're a B2B SaaS or a B2C app.

aboutWhyDesc: We use different journeys to analyze adoption, detect friction points, and guide our product decisions.
aboutGamificationDesc: Some journeys include gamification mechanics (rewards, badges…) to boost engagement and retention.
aboutDataDesc: All data displayed here comes from our public SDK: you can use it in your own applications.
